decision_conditions: The decision to approve the submitted details relating to water management strategy pursuant to condition 5 of planning permission ref:

172559FUL dated 16/08/2021 has been taken having regard to the policies and proposals in the Ealing Local Plan and to all relevant material considerations including Supplementary Planning Guidance as set out below:
Policy 1.2 Delivery of the Vision for Ealing

In deciding to grant this discharge of condition, specific consideration was given to water infrastructure capacity. The proposal is considered acceptable on these grounds and is also considered to comply with the relevant policies in the DPD. It

is considered there are not any other material considerations in this case that would warrant a refusal of the application. | This decision is concerned with water management strategy pursuant to condition 5 only. All other aspects of the development should be carried out in accordance with planning permission 172559FUL dated 16/08/2021.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of Surface Water Drainage pursuant to condition 5  of planning permission ref: 172559FUL dated 16/08/2021: Construction of a part-two, part-three, part-five storey building comprising twenty self-contained flats (Use Class C3) and 94.3sqm of flexible commercial space (Use Classes E(a), E(b), E(c), E(g) and F1) (following demolition of existing buildings); five dwellinghouses (Use Class C3); and associated landscaping, as well as, amenity, cycle parking, waste storage and vehicle parking spaces
